data.title: Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi
data.meta_description: Experience the best Abu Dhabi hotel, offering luxurious rooms and suites, fine dining, private spa and wedding
data.text:
Renovated rooms and suites

Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental offers breathtaking sea or garden views and luxurious touches abound in its newly renovated expansive room and suites.

The EP Club

Unmatched in quality of service and offerings, enhance your stay with exclusive access to The EP Club when booking a Club room or a Suite.

Private beach

Within 100 hectares of luscious gardens and lawns, and along 1.3 km of pristine beach, enjoy a plethora of activities for all athletic levels and ages.

Meeting and events

Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental is the premier meeting and conference destination in Abu Dhabi, boasts a total meeting and conference space exceeding 7,000 sqm including an Auditorium and Ballroom accommodating 1,100 and 2,400 guests, respectively.

Talea by Antonio Guida

The menu at Talea – “Cucina di Famiglia” which means family-style cuisine – draws on Antonio Guida’s distinctive culinary alchemy and interpretation of classical dishes that are traditionally known and cherished by many households across Italy.

Brasserie & Bar

Broadway

Book your tickets for the IMPOSSIBLE show by world-renowned magician, DMC.

Exceptional culinary experiences

Episodes

A new series is premiering at Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi.
